title: Nuraghe S. Cadrina
description: A nuragic village of the Middle Bronze Age (ca. 1700-1350 BC), Nuraghe S. Cadrina has a central tower with an original diameter of 11.70 m.

properties.description: Coordinates after Wikimapia; verified in Google Earth 2013.
properties.title: location of Nuraghe S. Cadrina
